document.full_text: roger federer started his clay-court season on tuesday by dispatching philipp kohlschreiber of germany 6-2, 6-1 with precise shot-making at the monte carlo masters.
document.title: federer starts clay-court season with monaco win
lines_and_colors: roger federer started his clay-court season on tuesday by dispatching philipp kohlschreiber of germany 6-2, 6-1 with precise shot-making at the monte carlo masters.
